overview:
Jalem Getz is serial entrepreneur and investor.

Jalem founded BUYSEASONS, Inc. in 1999 and served as its President and CEO until he retired to pursue other opportunities in December, 2010. BUYSEASONS is the largest retailer and supplier of costumes and party supplies on the Internet. Prior to starting BUYSEASONS in 1999, Jalem co-founded specialty retail company GMI in 1995 at age 22. During his tenure, GMI became one of Wisconsinâ€™s fastest growing companies, and the largest seasonal retailer in Milwaukee Wisconsin. Jalem grew up in Northern California.
